attributes.action: reframe from reading the name of deceased servicemen at the start of P.M.Qs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reading of deceased servicemens's names at the start of P.M.Q.s is a new departure and is inappropriate. The Primeminister should use the time to answer questions put directlty to him. P.M.Q.s is real political theatre and is not the appropriate place for honouring the fallen.
